For everyone who's complaining or making requests: this is scene releases, and rather old ones from back in the days when 192 kbps were standard for mp3 rips. I haven't ripped these, and don't own all the albums so a FLAC collection won't be coming from me. Enjoy anyway! Surprised to see this torrent is alive even after almost 4 years!
